title: Episode 223 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive episode information including Japanese air date (February 27, 2005), production credits (animation director Kenji Yokoyama, director Hidehiko Kadota, screenplay by Junki Takegami), plot summary, and trivia about this being Takegami's final screenwriting credit and the 10.9% TV rating.

title: Ocean's Dream Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Arc overview including information that this is the sixth filler arc, episodes 220-224, based on the PlayStation game 'One Piece: Ocean's Dream!' Arc plot progression and character information for Noko and Drim.

title: Noko - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character profile for Noko including appearance description (orange seahorse with red stars, blue eyes that glow red when hypnotizing), Nemu Nemu no Mi Devil Fruit abilities (memory stealing, hypnosis, spectral illusions), voice actors (Japanese: Keiichi Sonobe, English: Cris George), and role in the arc.

title: Drim - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character profile for Drim including appearance (young boy with lavender hair, yellow hat with teal stripes, purple cape), personality, role as Noko's hypnotized victim, voice actors (Japanese: Chinami Nishimura, English: Mary Morgan), and appearances in the PlayStation game and GBA remake.

title: Kokoro no Chizu - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Opening song information: 'Kokoro no Chizu' (Map of the Heart) by BOYSTYLE, used for episodes 207-263, released November 17, 2004, lyrics by MIZUE, composed by Kazunori Watanabe, arranged by Ryo Yonemitsu. First opening aired in widescreen.

title: Mirai Kōkai - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Ending song information: 'Mirai Kōkai' (Future Voyage) by Tackey & Tsubasa, the fourteenth ending used for episodes 207-230. Replaced with 'Eternal Pose' for FUNimation releases due to licensing issues. Features Straw Hat crew members with animals.

title: One Piece season 7 - Wikipedia
author: Wikipedia Contributors
notes: Season 7 information and episode listings for context of Episode 223's placement in the series.

title: One Piece Diaries #27: Ocean's Dream Arc
author: Comicon Editorial Team
notes: First-time viewer review of the Ocean's Dream Arc noting the arc was surprisingly compelling with meaningful flashbacks. Positive reception perspective.

author: Poggers Editorial
notes: Comprehensive arc summary and review with episode-by-episode breakdown.

notes: Contemporary 2008 blog review providing critical perspective on the arc, describing it as confusing. Historical reception data.
